item.title: Fairford Probate Inventories, 1648-1790
item.description:
This run of over 60 probate inventories, held at Gloucestershire Archives, was transcribed in 2013 by members of the Fairford History Society. Some are in near-duplicate versions, marked a and b.

Among the named occupations, maltsters occur frequently, alongside numerous yeomen and husbandmen.
item.dc:creator: JamesH
